name: Mirror House
description:
Made by Sam "Orionhart" Reinhart and Austin "Jokundor" Piko in 3 days for the Indie Tales Gamejam hosted by Adam C Younis.

All assets, including sounds, textures, scripts and more were made completely from scratch in the 3 day time limit. The project was submitted on time, however, there was an error with one of the meshes that was not caught and caused the main mechanic to not fire. This has been fixed in the current version.

v0.1.2 and beyond are expanded and bugfixed versions of the GameJam game. v0.1 is the only one that maintains the code and assets from the Jam.

Controls:

ZX to reset

F to toggle fullscreen

Esc to pause/unpause

WASD to move

Left Click to pick-up and place objects.

Hint: Look at your reflection... you might find something unexpected.
